name: The Last Resource
description: This game is my first try on game-making. The game is set in a pyramid in Egypt, a legend has been formed around it in recent years, in it there will be numerous difficulties that consist of solving puzzles and / or riddles in order to advance to a next phase and get closer to a relic, These puzzles will range from moving blocks to avoiding traps like a crossbow, as well as going through a void using a rope.
